phrases: Today I promised to play with Saikawa in the park.
Do you have any plans for today, Miss Kobayashi?
I guess I would like to spend my day off relaxing at home for once.
I will give it my utmost best as your maid to ensure you can relax.
Well, just leaving me alone is fine.
I hope the sun comes out today.
It is a book about the language of flowers.
The meaning of shepherd's purse is...
Shepherd's Purse Flower Meaning: I will offer everything to you.
I will offer everything to you?!
I have been trying to change the temperature and such,
depending on how you are feeling.
It is not because I am a dragon.
It is because I am me.
Well, I should go shopping soon.
What should I make for tonight's dinner?
Let us go with that, then.
Make us proper ones today, please.
For example, the house mouse only lives for a year to a year and a half.
Every living creature has its own perception of time,
and applying human standards to them is mistaken.
How long are you planning to keep doing this?
I am the doubt within you.
How long are you planning to keep doing this?
I just want to enjoy this time I have now,
and spend time with Miss Kobayashi, that is all...
One day you will have to go back.
I do not intend to go back.
Because I am Miss Kobayashi's maid.
What will you do if you have a reason to return?
If the war back there worsens?
You understand why I am here, yes?
You are coming home with me.
Tohru, this is not where you belong.
Tohru's still not back yet, huh.
Just how far did she go to shop?
I think the Emperor of Demise, Lady Tohru's father, came to pick her up.
I do not think she will come back to this world anymore.
She cannot go against the Emperor of Demise.
(It Was the Final Episode Before We Knew It)
Yeah, I will take care of them.
Kanna-chan's staying at Saikawa-san's place tonight.
Want to go for drinks after we are done?
Well, Kanna-sama, young lady, good night.
Hades7: Well, time for me to drop off.
Ebony Holy Knight: Oh, me, too.
Ebony Holy Knight: Ooyama-san, good night.
I should have told her the omurice was good,
if things were going to turn out like this.
Oh, I cannot fit inside in this form.
Why did you come back without permission?
Because I want to be here.
We are forbidden from interfering in this world.
You are coming home with me.
What you want does not matter.
You cannot be in this world.
You cannot throw the world into chaos over your whims.
Because this is where I belong.
You would live a quiet life as a human?
One day you will fray apart.
You have sensed that, have not you?
Is it okay if I speak up?
That was a mean way of phrasing it.
But it is not nice to butt in between a parent and child.
I should probably respect Tohru's decision.
You might be the one eliminated, depending on what you say.
Tohru said she does not want to go back!
You cannot interfere in this world, right?
But I can leave you just shy of death.
That will not change how I feel!
We must obey the rules of the world.
If the dragons charged with defending order are found to be in this world,
others will be influenced by that and make their way here.
Things may be fine now, but eventually some will plot an invasion.
That would not be Tohru's fault.
You are just twisting this into her responsibility!
Why are you so fixated on Tohru?
Do not tell me you like Tohru?
I cannot believe a human like you would.
and sometimes she feels down, but she hides it with a laugh.
And to top it off, she is a maid!
Do not take my maid away!
In that case, this space is too small.
I will decide where I belong on my own.
But that is as a dragon.
If you defy me, I will not show mercy.
I am sorry, Miss Kobayashi, but could you step back for a bit?
Why are you dragons like this?
You will never get anywhere if you cannot compromise.
Knowing you are different is only the start.
You grow closer or more distant,
again and again, while realizing those differences.
And then you start finding the aspects you like.
Then you can forge both trust and bonds.
Do you genuinely believe you can live alongside her?
We have already been doing that for a long time.
It is about whether or not you believe it can last.
Try having faith in your daughter!
Not with something like a human who does not even have the lifespan to live alongside her.
I do not need that much.
Kanna-san said she was coming over to play again today.
In that case, I will prepare chocolates.
I am thinking of going home for the first time in a while.
I will never be able to grow old with Miss Kobayashi.
One day, the time will come when we have to part.
Even so, I would never think I was better off not meeting her.
I just want to treasure this time we have.
